result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kristi Jo Sordahl

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on October 12, 2022 at 10:15 am.

10:41 a.m. Defendant Kristi Jo Sordahl appeared by video.  Attorney Heidi E. Brewer appeared by video for Kristi Jo Sordahl.  Prosecuting attorney Matthew J Tingstad in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court calls case, cites appearances.  Parties request a PTC to finish case.  10/12 at 10:15 a.m.  Adj.  10:42 a.m.  klr
Status conference on September 26, 2022 at 10:45 am.

DA requests more time to resolve case.  Atty Brewer provides update to Court.  Requests another STC be set.  211 Hancock Street, Wakefield, MI.  Updated address.  STC in 30 days.  9/26 at 10:45 a.m.  Adj.  10:53 a.m.  klr

records.descr: Waiver of time limits for preliminary hearing

records.addlTxt: 9:32 a.m.  Court calls case.  Atty Heidi Brewer appears on behalf of def who appears from GCJ.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI. Def waives reading of complaint and pleads NG to misd. charge.  Def also waives time limits for preliminary hearing.  PTC to be set for 7/28 at 2:45 p.m.  Adj.  9:35 a.m.  klr

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Adjourned initial appearance on July 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.

10:07 AM Defendant Kristi Jo Sordahl not in court.  Matthew J Tingstad appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case, provides background.  Def still in GCJ.  Court has received PD report indicating def qualifies, but no atty appointed yet.  AIA for July 11 at 9:00 a.m.  set by Court.  Adj.  10:08 a.m.  klr
Adjourned initial appearance on June 13, 2022 at 10:00 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Kristi Jo Sordahl
Current: 100 West Iron St., Gogebic County Jail, Bessemer, MI 49911 United States  (Effective: 05-25-2022)
Prior: 211 Hancock St, Wakefield, MI 49968

09:08 AM Defendant Kristi Jo Sordahl appeared by phone means. Prosecuting Atty Matthew J Tingstad appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Court calls case, cites appearances.  Bond already set.  Def unsure if she has copy of complaint.  Court reads charges.  Court explains rt to counsel and process.  PD Info to be faxed to def.  Def understands her rights to atty.  Court not doing initial today.  Continues bond until def has atty.  June 13 at 10:00 a.m.  Def advised to provide new address if changes.  All info to be sent to GCJ.  Adj.  9:14 a.m.  klr

01/24/22 PC/Bond hearing minutes:  1:52 p.m.  Court calls case.  Def appears, in custody.  Matthew J. Tingstad appears for the State of WI.  PC statement provided to Court.  Right to atty explained.  Deputy Randall signed PC statement.  Court finds PC.  DA requests $1,000 cash bond with conditions of no use or possession of controlled substances and no contact with George Clark.  Def objects to cash bond.  Court sets bond of $3,000 signature.  No use or possession of controlled substances.  Case set for 2/14/22 at 9:00 a.m. for next hearing.  Adj.  2:02 p.m.  klr
